{"name": "Sconiers Homeless Preventive Organization - Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Call before 10 AM to confirm
- This is office you need to call them so they will apoint you to the nearby food pantry.
- There is no food distribution at this location.
- Don't go at this location.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.shpoinc.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "848 Pegg Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Atlanta", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30315", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.6890554, "longitude": -84.416759}, "phones": [{"number": "(404) 454-3554", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Christmas basket and Thanksgiving basket provided"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
